channel.title: Need a good source compiler!
channel.description: I have syscape, i need a source compiler, some1 plawx help..:)

item.title: Need a good source compiler!
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

This is my simple compiler xD

@echo off
COLOR 04
title YourServerNameHere compiler
echo ---------------------
echo Were compiling wait please!
echo ---------------------
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_17\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Files Compiled =)
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Make sure you have newest java. I think its update 18

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good source compiler!
item.dc:creator: @ranger65pure ranger65pure
item.description:
@ranger65pure wrote:

Here is my compiler.bat…

@echo off echo SinisterScape ownz title SiniserScape Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

And here is my Compiler and Run.bat

@echo off echo Shadow Compiler title Shadow Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished Compiling! wait 5 cls echo Starting Server... echo Please wait... java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Hope this helped you…

Read full topic
